tool_description: GeoInfo is a comprehensive geographic information retrieval service that provides detailed data about countries, states, and districts worldwide. It offers developers access to a rich dataset sourced from reliable and up-to-date sources. With its easy-to-use endpoints and robust authentication, GeoInfoAPI is a one-stop solution for all your geographic information needs. Whether you’re building an application that requires location data or conducting research that needs geographic insights, Ge...
name: GeoInfo
title: GeoInfo

api_list.name: Get City
api_list.description: Get all the City's in the State. ie, give the State name after /state like, "/state/Tamil%20Nadu" or use the state code like "/state/4035"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geoinfo.p.rapidapi.com/state/Tamil%20Nadu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get State
api_list.description: Get all the states in the Country. ie, give the country name after /county like, "/country/India" or use the state code like "/country/101"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geoinfo.p.rapidapi.com/country/India"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
